verses.verse: Except the Lord <WH3068> build <WH1129> the house <WH1004>, they labor <WH5998> in vain <WH7723> that build <WH1129> it <WH3068>: except the Lord keep <WH8104> the city <WH5892>, the watchman <WH8104> wakes <WH8245> in vain <WH7723>.

It is vain <WH7723> for you to rise up <WH6965> early <WH7925>, to sit up <WH3427> late <WH309>, to eat <WH398> the bread <WH3899> of sorrows <WH6089>: for so he gives <WH5414> his beloved <WH3039> sleep <WH8142>.
Behold <WH1121>, sons are a heritage <WH5159> of the Lord <WH3068>: and the fruit <WH6529> of the womb <WH990> is his reward <WH7939>.
As arrows <WH2671> are in the hand <WH3027> of a mighty man <WH1368>; so are sons <WH1121> of the youth <WH5271>.
Happy <WH835> is the man <WH1397> that has his quiver <WH827> full <WH4390> of them <WH954>: they shall not be ashamed, but they shall speak <WH1696> with the enemies <WH341> in the gate <WH8179>.
